on_entry: /gamerule commandblockoutput false
/gamerule sendcommandfeedback false

/scoreboard objectives add wbdjcg dummy 等级草稿
/scoreboard objectives add wbdjjf dummy 等级积分
/scoreboard objectives add wbxlgj dummy 蓄力时间
/scoreboard objectives add wblzxz dummy 粒子禁用选择
/scoreboard objectives add wbbhd dummy 饱和度
/scoreboard objectives add wbef dummy 勇者之力冷却
/scoreboard objectives add wbfl dummy 法力值
/scoreboard objectives add wbnldx dummy 能量值
/scoreboard objectives add wbldid dummy 领地id
/scoreboard objectives add wbldpd dummy 领地判断
/scoreboard objectives add wbldzr dummy 领地主人
/scoreboard objectives add wbldcg dummy 领地草稿
/scoreboard objectives add wbwqlqjs dummy 武器冷却加速
/scoreboard objectives add wbwqlq dummy 武器冷却
/scoreboard objectives add wbkjlq dummy 盔甲冷却
/scoreboard objectives add wbkjlqjs dummy 盔甲冷却加速
/scoreboard objectives add wbkjlqzh dummy 盔甲冷却总和
/scoreboard objectives add wbfinal dummy 常量
/scoreboard objectives add wbkjlqcg dummy 盔甲冷却草稿

/scoreboard objectives add arrow_type dummy arrow_type
